ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment to the position of special adviser to the Prime Minister of the Honourable JAKE EPP, of Calgary, Alberta, as a Member of the Independent Panel on Canada's Future Role in Afghanistan, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on March 31, 2008.
